title: kAyalArenu ranga
sahitya:
kAyalArenu ranga kaNDavara bAgilanu nAyikunniyante narara piDisuta


caraNam 1    udayadaliyettu sandhyAna vidhigaLa biTTu padumanAbhana smaraNe modalillade 
mudadi ninnarcisade narara sadanavai pokku odagi sEveya mADi avara bAgilanu
    caraNam 2    kalla karagisa bahudu kaDale hurigaDaleyoLu tailavanu tegedAdaruNNa bahudu
ballidara manava meccisalAre prati dinadi hallu giri giridu hambalisi bAya biDuta
    caraNam 3    intu nAnA cinteyali ninna neneyade bhrAntiyendemba hebbalege sikki 
antya modalanu kANe arike ninaginidella nishcintanAgirisayya purandara viTTala
